headingText.value: Hutchison Maintenance - Your Trusted Cleaning Partner
headingText.instructions: The Heading Text of the page.

descriptionText.value: Hutchison Maintenance is a professional cleaning service provider with over 20 years of experience in home, office, and restoration cleaning. We are dedicated to delivering top-notch cleaning services to the Greater Sudbury Area, Ontario, ensuring that our clients' needs are met with reliability, trustworthiness, and fair pricing.
descriptionText.instructions: The description text of the hero page. Should be a 2 paragraph text.

heroImageUrl.instructions: An url to a Hero image that will be displayed on the page with a 16:9 aspect ratio

heroImageAlt.value: Hutchison Maintenance team providing cleaning services
heroImageAlt.instructions: Alt Text for the Hero Image. Should be a short description of the image.
